description:
Sean Cody is breaking open the Bible Belt!
It seems like we've had a rash of hot, corn-fed, Southern boys lately — and man, am I having fun!
Stephen is from a small farm town in the south. Apparently, he has five brothers (all straight) who are just as hot as he is. He was a jock in high school and was on both the wrestling and football teams.
He's one of the shyest guys I've ever worked with. When I asked him about his sex life he got so embarrassed he couldn't look into the camera. So, I put some pussy porn on and he really seemed to love it.
For a quiet guy, he becomes quite animated when he cums!
title: Stephen
